import React from 'react'; function Privacy() { return (

Privacy Policy

Last updated: January 1, 2024 | POPIA Compliant

Information We Collect

We collect your name, contact details, delivery address, and payment information when you place orders. We also use cookies for website functionality.

How We Use Your Information

To process orders, arrange delivery, provide customer support, and send order updates. Marketing communications only with your consent.

Information Sharing

We share information only with PEP/Courier Guy for delivery, payment processors, and when legally required. We never sell your data.

Your POPIA Rights

You can access, update, or delete your information. Opt out of marketing anytime. Contact us to exercise these rights.

Data Security

We use secure systems to protect your information. Data is stored in South Africa and processed according to POPIA requirements.

Privacy Questions? Contact privacy@lumebylee.co.za

); } export default Privacy;
